revised_title: Investigating the Dimorphism of English Nummulites Species and the Relationship Between Megalosphere Size and Microspheric and Megalospheric Tests
tldr: This study examines the dimorphism of English Nummulites species and explores the relationship between megalosphere size and microspheric and megalospheric tests. The author investigates the life history of these species and their alternating generations, providing insights into the distribution and classification of these organisms.
